content:
Agent managers can manage the assigned AI agent, invite new users, and assign roles below their level.
They can use the chat, upload knowledge files, work with Result storage, and manage chat settings.

comment.text: This description explains the permissions and capabilities of an AI Agent Manager. It's used to describe the role's abilities within an AI Room, outlining their ability to manage agents, users, roles, and chat settings. This text will likely appear in a user interface element explaining the AI Agent Manager role.
